text: ya 'ayuha alnaas khafuu allah waltzmu awamrh, wajtanibuu nwahyh; fahu aladhi khalaqakum min nafs wahidat hi adam ealayh alslam, wakhalaq minha zawjaha wahi hwa', wanashr minhuma fi 'anha' al'ard rijalana kthyrana wanisa'an kthyrat, wraqbu allah aladhi yasal bih baedakum bedana, wahdharuu 'ana tqteu arhamkm. 'iina allah muraqib lajamie ahwalkm
